title: Service Learning Design Course for Strengthening Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Social Issues and Core Job-Related Competencies
context.additional_context: Community-linked project-based learning environment design to strengthen current practitioners' problem-solving skills for social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the theoretical and practical principles of service learning and apply them to real-world cases
Learners can analyze community issues and design project-based solutions
Learners can execute service learning projects using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners can compile project outcomes into portfolios and conduct achievement presentations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
